parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>This is the Ryuda training institution. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon
you.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Ryuda Soldier>This is the training institution of Ryuda. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon
you.
\N<Segi>Please... take this.
\N<Riia>Mama...?
\N<Segi>Riia...
\N<Riia>Why... is Mama here...?
\N<Segi>That, well...

\N<Riia>That... it's Fubii's notification, right? Why is Mama doing
it instead of him...?
\N<Segi>...
\N<Riia>You two are... really lovers, aren't you...?

\N<Segi>No, that's not it. I just happened to meet him on my way
home and he asked me to...

\N<Segi>I tried to refuse, but he looked so ill that I couldn't just
leave him be...
\N<Riia>...
\N<Segi>It's really... really just that.

\N<Segi>More importantly, Riia... is it safe for you to be out and
about...?
\N<Riia>...yeah.

\N<Riia>After all... Mama has been fighting in the training matches
in place of Papa, hasn't she?

\N<Riia>When you saved me the other day, I kind of thought so... but
I didn't want to believe it.
\N<Segi>...I'm sorry for keeping silent.

\N<Riia>It's okay... because I'm still of no use to anyone. That's
why... Mama had to do this, right...?

\N<Segi>Don't say you're of no use... It's because you were there
that Mama could do her best. And that will surely be the
same from now on.
\N<Riia>Mama...

\N<Segi>...Indeed, Mama might have gone through a lot of terrible
things in places you don't know about.

\N<Segi>But even so... no matter what terrible things happen or what
insults are thrown at me. There are still things I need to
teach you.
\N<Riia>...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Riia>I understand... I believe in Mama. No matter what happens...
I'm on your side.
\N<Segi>Yes... thank you, Riia.
info5a
CPD_INVALID
CPD_VALID
town1

In the end... the training match was decided with Rozaro-
san's victory.

Logically, this should have led to his reappointment as an
officer... and this farcical tragedy should have come to an
end.

However... there was no communication from Ryuda itself...
and several days passed by just like that.

The future of the town, my own circumstances, and above all,
Lord Yuia's situation...

There were pressing issues that couldn't be ignored, but all
we could do was wait...
A

\N<Ryuda Soldier>This is the Ryuda training institution. If you have no
business here, leave before unnecessary suspicion falls upon
you.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Can't you see? I'm studying right now, don't talk to me...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>My dad is fighting in the training troops... It's still okay
for now, but I wonder what will happen to me and mom if he
ever loses...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What am I even coming here for... To become a soldier of
Ryuda? Or maybe...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Who...? If you have no business, please go over there. I
don't want to be seen by the Ryuda soldiers.

\N<Man>The children of the town learn here. It used to be a pure
place of study, but...
clear_all_weathers
\N<Rame>...Are you going?
\N<Riia>...Yeah.
\N<Rame>Hey! Riia-chan, I...!
\N<Riia>...

\N<Rame>So, that... Are you going to stay in the city alone, Riia-
chan...?
\N<Riia>...I can't. I have to go with Dad and Mom.

\N<Rame>I-I see. Sorry for saying something weird... And... you
wouldn't want to be with someone like me, right? It would
bring back memories, wouldn't it?
\N<Riia>...
\N<Rame>...

\N<Riia>I have... a lot to learn from Dad and Mom. Especially from
Dad. That's why I'm going with them.
\N<Rame>From Yuia-san? What kind of things...?

\N<Riia>Like how to fight... ways to become stronger. Both
physically and mentally... you know. How not to hate or
judge someone over little things... stuff like that.

\N<Riia>Also... to begin with, how to protect the people who are
important to you so that it never comes to that... you know.
\N<Rame>Eh...?
\N<Riia>...
\N<Rame>Does that mean...

\N<Riia>...I will definitely come back for you. If I can become
stronger, I will for sure. Strong enough to erase the pain
I've caused you.

\N<Rame>It's me, you know? It was me who hurt you a lot, Riia-
chan...?
\N<Riia>It's okay... it's probably half my fault anyway.

\N<Rame>That's not true! It's because I was weak! That's why! I want
to become as strong as Riia-chan so I won't lose!

\N<Riia>You can do it. Surely all the tough experiences were for
that reason.
\N<Rame>...I'll be waiting. Don't forget about me.
\N<Riia>Yeah. Don't forget about me either.

\N<Rame>It's okay... I'll definitely keep my promise. After all, I
am... an older sister to Riia-chan.
A
